attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the operation. For operations that have both REST and Plugin implementations the name applies to both. An operation doesn't necessarily need to have both REST and Plugin implementations.

attributes.name: restpath
attributes.value: The canonical form of the full REST URL

attributes.name: pluginpath
attributes.description: The plugin path used by the Agent core to invoke the operation on solutions plugin

attributes.name: returntype
attributes.description: the return value of the API, a resource type or an array of resource type
